snippet: The largest natural and organic grocery chain in the United States expects 2014 same-store sales growth of 5.5 to 6.2 percent, down from a previous forecast range of 5.5 to 7 percent.
abstract: Whole Foods Market expects 2014 same-store sales growth of 5.5 to 6.2 percent, down from a previous forecast range of 5.5 to 7 percent.
lead_paragraph: The largest natural and organic grocery chain in the United States expects 2014 same-store sales growth of 5.5 to 6.2 percent, down from a previous forecast range of 5.5 to 7 percent.

headline.main: Whole Foods Lowers Its Forecasts Again
headline.print_headline: Whole Foods Lowers Its Forecasts Again
